sentences.sentence: Early success may lead to megalomania.
sentences.translation: 少年得志可能导致妄自尊大。

sentences.sentence: Taxpayers bear the cost of guaranteeing this fruit of megalomania.
sentences.translation: 承保这一自大狂成果的费用由纳税人负担。

sentences.sentence: He is very bright. He helps me a lot, to not have any fits of megalomania.
sentences.translation: 他很聪明，他帮了我很多，他帮我不会变成自大狂。
